items.titolo: I used Claude Code to vibe code a Mac app in 8 hours, and it was more work than magic

items.titolo: The Race to Build the DeepSeek of Europe Is On
items.descrizione: As Europe’s long-standing alliance with the US falters, its push to become a self-sufficient AI superpower has become more urgent.
